name: .OSZ2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .OSZ2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an OSZ2 file in osu! (Windows). To do so, click and drag your OSZ2 file into the osu! game window. osu! will then add the file to its Songs folder.
You may also be able to open OSZ2 files in some osu! variants. For example, osu!mac (Mac) allows players to import OSZ2-based levels.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
